replies.author: 飞翔荷兰人
replies.txt_content:
在plugins\Multiverse-Core路径下用notpad+打开worlds文件，将对应世界的此段文字spawn修改为false
animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
注意看前标要选择你要修改的世界比如你的plotworld就是这种
 plotworld:
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
    alias: poltworld
    color: WHITE
    style: NORMAL
    pvp: 'false'
    scale: '1.0'
    respawnWorld: ''
    allowWeather: 'true'
    difficulty: NORMAL
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
    animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'false'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
